power.title: Binding Ooze
power.fluff: Your foe is covered in acidic, jellylike mass that continues to eat at it when the foe tries to attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a binding ooze in the target's space until the end of your next turn. The ooze does not occupy a space, and remains in the target's space when the target moves. You immediately make the Ooze Cover attack.
While the ooze remains, whenever the target makes an attack, it takes acid damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
If the target has vulnerable acid or other weakness to acid, it takes one-half this damage at the start of its turn.

section.name: Target:
section.text: The creature covered by the ooze

power.title: Charm of the Defender
power.fluff: You weave a skein of deceitful magic, tricking your foe to become a hero to its enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target up to 3 squares. You can resolve the rest of the power against the target even if you slide it outside the power's range.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is deceived until the end of your next turn.

While deceived, the target is immobilized. When an enemy starts its turn adjacent to the deceived target, the target must make a melee basic attack against that enemy. It has a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll equal to your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Concussive Echo
power.fluff: A focused blast of thunder slams into your foe, and the energy of the blast is stored in your enemy's body so that it is released in a concussive burst

section.text: The first time the target makes an attack before the end of your next turn, it deals thunder damage to itself and each enemy within 3 squares of it before the attack is resolved. The thunder damage equals 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target only deals thunder damage to itself the first time it makes an attack before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Corrosive Mist
power.fluff: A mist of suspended acid droplets consumes your chosen foes

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus acid damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of floating droplets of acid that lasts until the end of your next turn.

Each creature that enters the zone or ends its turn in the zone takes acid damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

power.title: Enemies Abound
power.fluff: You weave a veil of illusion over the eyes of your enemies, causing them to view their allies as threats

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the following two effects apply:
► You and allies can treat each target as an ally for the purposes of flanking.
► The target does not count as flanking you or your allies for other enemies, though it can still flank you with an enemy that is not a target.

power.title: Fire Burst
power.fluff: You send a fiery red bead streaking toward your foes, then make it burst into a great ball of magical flame

power.title: Fire Sea Travel
power.fluff: You open a window into the Fire Sea, scorching nearby enemies before stepping through to appear a distance away

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Perception checks until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

power.title: Ghoul Strike
power.fluff: You make a slashing motion against an enemy, causing darkness to bind it and filling the air around it with a charnel stench

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You create a zone of darkness in a burst 2 centered on the target. The zone lasts as long as the target is affected by this power.

Any creature other than you grants combat advantage while in the zone, and takes necrotic damage if it ends its turn in the zone. The necrotic damage equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Lightning Bolt
power.fluff: Brilliant strokes of blue-white lightning erupt from your outstretched hand

section.text: If you target only one creature, you can roll twice and take the higher result

power.title: Murderous Twin
power.fluff: You conjure a twisted, shadowy twin of your enemy, a murderous vestige that wreaks havoc on itself and its allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a murderous twin of the target in an unoccupied space adjacent to the target until the end of your next. The twin is the same size as the target, and occupies its space.
The target and its allies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls while adjacent to the twin.
While the twin remains, you can use the Twin Stalker attack once, using the twin as the point of origin and the same target.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: The target either leaves a square adjacent to the twin or makes an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The twin teleports to a space adjacent to the target.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Wisdom modifier + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage.

power.title: Phantom Foes
power.fluff: Spectral warriors swirl around everyone in an area, causing them to lash out in a blind panic

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

The first time a target makes an attack before the end of your next turn, you can use a free interrupt to force it to make a saving throw. If it fails the saving throw, you can change the target of that attack to a different creature within range of that attack.

power.title: Puckish Sprite
power.fluff: You call forth a mischievous fey creature, aglow with fairy light and as meddlesome as a satyr

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a puckish sprite in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The sprite occupies its square and lasts until the end of your next turn.
Enemies adjacent to the sprite grant combat advantage to you and your allies. When the sprite appears, you make the Surprise Sprite Strike attack, using the sprite as the origin square.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage, and the target must make a basic attack as a free reaction against a creature of your choice.

power.title: Repelling Sphere
power.fluff: You repulse your enemies with an expanding sphere of force

section.name: Active Familiar:
section.text: You can use your active familiar as the origin square for this attack.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target to the closest space outside of the burst.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage, and you push the target 1 square.

power.title: Spectral Ram
power.fluff: You seize your foe with unseen magical force and bash it against the ceiling and walls before hurling it to the ground

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target up to 3 square and knock it prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target up to 3 squares.

power.title: Thunder Cage
power.fluff: Your foe is rucked by thunderous noise, and an ominous rumble begins at your enemy's slightest movement

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus thunder damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target leaves the space it is currently occupying before the end of your next turn, it takes thunder damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Twist of Space
power.fluff: You bend and fold the fabric of space, scattering your enemies across the battlefield

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport the target up to 3 squares. Each target that you teleport becomes slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You teleport the target half the distance.

power.title: Vile Vermin
power.fluff: The ground seems to burst upward as a surge of centipedes, beetles, rats, and snakes work their way to cover your foe

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure vile vermin to cover the target until the end of your next turn. The vermin do not occupy a space, and remains in the target's space when the target moves.
While the vermin remain, each enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes poison damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Winter's Wrath
power.fluff: You raise your hand, and an icy blizzard rains down mercilessly upon your an area you designate

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You create a zone of hail in the burst until the end of your next turn. You can dismiss the zone as a minor action.

The zone is lightly obscured. Each creature that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes cold damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can only take this damage once each turn.
